The City of Santa Clarita is presenting a Parent Resource Symposium, that is open to the public. The program will include a Resource Fair and speakers from city agencies.

Learn strategies on how to connect with your child, healthy
alternatives, and trends in schools and the community.

The Program begins at 5:30 and runs until 7:30...tomorrow at City Hall in Valencia. The public is welcome to attend!

post_text: Last night SUSD teachers, administrators, Governing Board members, family and friends celebrated our 15 SCV Education Foundation Teachers of the Year. This amazing event honored 53 teachers from every school district in our local area. SUSD was very well represented with its amazing teachers. Each tribute illustrated their individual dedication to students and expertise in educating our students. THANKS to each of them for all they do!
